.. _alias_argument:

Alias argument decorator
========================

This section discusses the purpose of the `@alias_argument` decorator,
shows how to use it and provides reference documentation.

Purpose
-------

This decorator allows a function to accept a range of parameters names,
to make the interface easier to use for the end-user.


.. literalinclude:: alias-argument-1.py

The decorator also accept a list of alias values.

.. literalinclude:: alias-argument-2.py
